name: Chocolate Chip Baked Oatmeal
author: HERSHEY’S Kitchens
summary: The whole family will gather around when you pull this chocolate chip baked oatmeal, topped with fresh raspberries, out of the oven! If desired, serve with additional HERSHEY'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips, maple syrup, or honey.
ingredients: 1 ¾ cups milk or almond milk
⅓ cup maple syrup or honey
1 (12 ounce) package HERSHEY'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips, divided
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F
On a rimmed baking sheet, bake oats and pecans 4 to 5 minutes or until fragrant and lightly toasted
In a medium bowl, stir together the oats and pecans, cinnamon, baking powder, and salt
In another medium bowl, combine milk, maple syrup or honey, eggs, butter, and vanilla
Set aside 1/2 cup of the HERSHEY'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips for topping the baked oatmeal
Pour the remaining chocolate chips into the prepared baking dish, spreading into an even layer
Cover the chocolate with the dry oat mixture, then drizzle the wet ingredients over the oats
Stir once or twice to gently combine, but do not combine completely
Sprinkle reserved chocolate chips over the top, along with raspberries (if using)
Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until set and golden
If desired, add additional HERSHEY'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips, maple syrup, and/or honey for serving
